metadata.feature_description: Create, edit, and manage post tags for categorization and filtering

steps.action: Navigate to News page with Publisher module
steps.actual: News page loaded with list of posts displayed

steps.action: Click on a post to open Edit Post Details panel
steps.expected: Edit panel opens with Tags section visible
steps.actual: Edit Post Details panel opened showing Tags input field with existing tags

steps.action: Type 'testing' in the Tags input field and press comma
steps.expected: New tag is created and added to the post
steps.actual: Tag 'testing' was successfully added to the post, appearing as a tag chip

steps.action: With tags visible in Edit Post Details, click the 'x' button on a tag
steps.expected: Tag is removed from the post
steps.actual: Tag 'testing' was successfully removed after clicking the x button

steps.action: Type tag with special characters 'test@tag#123' and press comma
steps.expected: Tag with special characters is accepted or rejected with appropriate feedback
steps.actual: Tag 'test@tag#123' was accepted and added successfully - the system allows special characters in tags

steps.action: Attempt to add a tag that already exists on the post ('technology')
steps.expected: System prevents duplicate and provides visual feedback
steps.actual: When typing an existing tag, it was highlighted in red in the auto-suggest dropdown, indicating it's already added. System correctly prevents duplicates.

steps.action: Navigate to News page and locate the Tags filter section
steps.expected: Tag cloud/filter displays available tags with post counts
steps.actual: Tags filter section displayed in the sidebar showing tags like 'technology (2)' with counts indicating number of posts

steps.action: Click on 'technology' tag in the Tags filter
steps.expected: Post list filters to show only posts with that tag
steps.actual: Posts were filtered successfully. 'Viewing: technology x' indicator appeared and only posts tagged with 'technology' were displayed

observations: Auto-suggest functionality was observed when typing tags - existing tags appear in a dropdown for selection
Tags are stored using DNN's Taxonomy system (Terms attached to ContentItems) as confirmed in PostManager.cs
Tag cloud uses GetTopTags API endpoint from FilterController.cs to retrieve tag counts
Bulk tag operations UI was not found - tags are managed individually per post in the Edit Post Details panel
No explicit character limit validation was observed during testing - long tags appeared to be accepted
